channel.title: EmbeddingGemma on Cozy Corner Future
channel.description: Recent content in EmbeddingGemma on Cozy Corner Future

item.title: Building Your First RAG System
item.description:
üíé From Mining Ores to Mining Insights

Whether you are navigating the underground biomes of Core Keeper or the complex spreadsheets of a small business, “information overload” is the final boss.

A RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system is like giving an AI a specialized guidebook. Instead of relying on its general training, the AI looks at your specific data-like a game wiki, your research notes, or legal contracts-to give you pinpoint-accurate answers.

item.title: I Trained a Tiny AI to Judge My Hacker News Feed (And You Can Too)
item.description:
It‚Äôs just too much noise.

Keeping up with AI News is tough. I spend way too much time skimming past titles that look techy but are totally irrelevant to what I‚Äôm actually wanting. Keyword filters are brittle because they miss the nuance.

I wanted a way to filter news based on ‚Äúvibes‚Äù, not just regex strings.

So, I‚Äôve been playing around with the EmbeddingGemma Tuning Lab, a new Hugging Face Space that provides a tool for fine-tuning Google‚Äôs embeddinggemma-300m model to understand your specific personal taste.
